com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice

接口 AylaLocalDeviceManager

  • 所有超级接口:
    AylaPlugin, DeviceClassPlugin
    所有已知实现类:
    AylaBLEDeviceManager

    public interface AylaLocalDeviceManager
extends DeviceClassPlugin
    The AylaLocalDeviceManager interface is an AylaPlugin interface used to help manage devices that reside outside the IP network. Bluetooth LE devices are an example of local devices. AylaLocalDeviceManager extends the DeviceClassPlugin interface, which allows this class to assign a specific AylaDevice subclass to devices managed by AylaDeviceManager. Implementers of this interface will need to provide means for discovering, registering and unregistering local devices. An example class that implements these interfaces for Bluetooth LE devices can be found in AylaBLEDeviceManager.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String PLUGIN_ID_LOCAL_DEVICE
      Local Device Plugin for communications with devices outside of LAN / Internet, such as Bluetooth LE devices.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      Searches for AylaLocalDevices nearby.

    • 字段详细资料

      • PLUGIN_ID_LOCAL_DEVICE

        static final java.lang.String PLUGIN_ID_LOCAL_DEVICE
        Local Device Plugin for communications with devices outside of LAN / Internet, such as Bluetooth LE devices. These plugins implement the AylaLocalDeviceManager interface. These plugins work with the Ayla Local Device SDK.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • findLocalDevices

        AylaAPIRequest findLocalDevices(java.lang.Object hint,
                                int timeoutInMs,
                                com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaLocalDevice[]> successListener,
                                ErrorListener errorListener)
        Searches for AylaLocalDevices nearby. The returned list should contain AylaLocalDevices that have been locally discovered. The returned devices may or may not be registered to the user.
        参数:
        hint - Search-specific hint used to filter the set of returned devices. The format of this object is not defined, but may be used by subclasses to filter based on Bluetooth address ranges, GATT service IDs, etc.
        timeoutInMs - Maximum time the search should take in ms
        successListener - Listener to be notified with the results
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest object. This object may be used to cancel the operation before the scan has completed.

      • registerLocalDevice

        AylaAPIRequest registerLocalDevice(AylaSessionManager sessionManager,
                                   AylaLocalDevice device,
                                   java.lang.String oem,
                                   com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaLocalDevice> successListener,
                                   ErrorListener errorListener)
        Registers a local device with the Ayla service. Devices are unregistered via a call to the device object's AylaLocalDevice.unregister(Response.Listener, ErrorListener) method.
        参数:
        sessionManager - Session manager for the account this device should be registered to
        device - Device to register. This should have been returned from findLocalDevices.
        oem - OEM ID for the account. This may be null if only one OEM exists for the signed-in account.
        successListener - Listener to receive the registered device upon success
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation
